Reviews.Title: “Good for Conventions but on the wrong side for sightseeing !”
Reviews.Author: ISHANIKA
Reviews.Content: I stayed in the Green Park Pendik for a convention.Right from day one when we reached the Ataturk airport , it took us forever to reach the hotel.Reason : It is on the Asian side of Turkey and crossing the Bosphorus itself takes 1-2 hours. The hotel in itself is very good with well appointed rooms , tea coffee maker , electronic safe etc but the house keeping staff does not speak English.We asked for Milk powder sachets and toilet roll over the phone for two days but to no avail..finally I went down to reception to give the same in writing,Promptly I was presented with two towels the next day..so much so for written instructions All in all a good hotel and ideal for big conventions but if you have Turkey sight seeing on your wishlist , the best is to stay near Taksim square on the European side which is where the party is !!

Reviews.Title: “2 days for my company's symposium”
Reviews.Author: neoxneox
Reviews.Content: the convention centre was huge enough for a symposium and the sound/visual sheme was ok. the hotel bars were rich and the stuff was wwll educated.the rooms were really excellent and teh sea sight is so nice,the hotel is so close to the sea and you can see the marmara sea islands from the frontside rooms.(if you want to visit the islands too,you can reach the port of boats to islands so easyl about 10 minutes travel by a taxi,indeed.)

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Property”
Reviews.Author: Rajandani
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for 3 nights in March 12 and enjoyed every bit of my stay at this property. Hotel is very strategically located facing the Sea of Marmara. I stayed at sea facing room which was very large and bed was also very large, nice and comfortable. There is a cable connection for internet and it works and has a great speed. Rooms are well appointed. Rooms facing the sea are large whereas the other rooms are of regular size. All fittings in bath room are of great quality and service is excellent. Hotel food is equally great and has variety. Large lobby with many information displays. Ideal hotel for conventions. Sabiha International airport is just 15 minutes drive. Nearest shopping at Pendorya is 5 minutes drive. Hotel is highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Good choice”
Reviews.Author: ozlempe
Reviews.Content: We have stayed in a deluxe suit for one night and it was a very clean and comfortable room. I loved the design. I definitely suggest this hotel for short-term visits in the Anatolian side of Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Reasonable rates on the Asian side of Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Skattanelanto
Reviews.Content: New, sterile hotel with big rooms. Below average restaurant in the hotel but good choices close by in Pendik.

Reviews.Title: “An welcome oasis on a business trip”
Reviews.Author: mkalfa
Reviews.Content: My stay at the Green Park Pendik Hotel was amazing. The service quality is very high, as one would expect in Turkey. What blew me away was the spa & gym: the massive and very modern gym, outdoor pool area (complete with hammocks), indoor pool area with jacuzzis, sauna, steam bath and a three room hamam are all free to use for any guest. I spent some time relaxing in the hamam after each work day. I only had one meal from the room service but that was very good and the portion more than generous. (The mushroom pasta was listed as a starter but was easily a full dinner for me.) The breakfast buffet was pretty good, featuring all sorts of fruit, vegetables and salads, as well as of course Turkish specialties like simit and helva. You can have breakfast on the terrace with a view on the sea. My room was small but very well equipped. It was facing the town, so I got a bit of noise from traffic and mosques, but it really didn't bother me. I know though that a colleague of mine though, staying at the same hotel a week later, paid for an upgrade to get a room facing the sea.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel away from city”
Reviews.Author: Eldhomittan
Reviews.Content: The hotel is a brand new one. Suitable for a larger groups for conference. Breakfast is good. Take a ferry and go to Pendik and then to hotel would be a time saver instead of crossing the Bhosphorous bridge by road. Getting a taxi from the hotel at night is a challenge.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel not too much to do round about it.”
Reviews.Author: alanatabz
Reviews.Content: Nice spacious hotel with good public areas Rooms were clean and neat. Only thing about room was no wifi and with cable only ipad was no use The only drawback wad my room on 2nd floor was bit noisy due to rail tracks behind hotel

Reviews.Title: “When the plane was suppose to land in UK,it had to de-tour in istanbul”
Reviews.Author: s2651990
Reviews.Content: I was actually going for holidays in my aunt's place. But the plane i took could not land in UK as it was snowing heavily. So it landed in istanbul. The people in charge took us here. we were surprised with the place. It was awesome. The room,toilet,food,people there and even the surroundings were great. We stayed there for 2 nights and it was really a good place. I definitely will want to go there again one day. And just a reminder that there are no wi-fi in the room but can get it in the lobby. The sofas there are really comfortable too.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, but far, far away”
Reviews.Author: mendjanbranko
Reviews.Content: Nice, large hotel, one of the biggest conference hotels in these parts of the world. Staff is nice, only thing is lack of the English language. Nice bistro, with tasty food, fantastic pub with good beer and football games. Overall, very pleasant stay.

HotelInfo.Name: The Green Park Pendik Hotel & Convention Center
HotelInfo.Address: Dogu Mah. Temenye Mevkii Eski Ankara Cad. No: 200, Istanbul 34890, Turkey
